block.p: COHEN-Aaron ''Ollie''. On Thursday, July 13, 2000. Of Boca Raton, FL. Formerly of Boston, MA. For 68 years the beloved husband of Eleanore (Mervis). Devoted father of Rhea and Martin Reiss of Boston, MA and Flois and David Landau of Miami, FL. Cherished grandfather of Mitchell Reiss, Randi McCormack, Robyn Waldeck, Jeffrey Schwartz, Susan Graver, Nancy Landau and greatgrandfather of nine. Services were held at Congregation Kehillath Israel, Brookline, MA on Friday, July 14. Memorial observance through Tuesday at the home of Rhea and Martin Reiss. In lieu of flowers, remembrances may be made to Geriatric Medicine Fund, in care of Dr. Joel Bauman Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital, 125 Nashua St., Boston, MA 02114. For more information call Levine Chapel, Brookline, MA.
